Name: Dual Wield Mastery
Description: You can dual wield weapons. On your turn, you can make an attack with your off-hand weapon.

Name: Mage Slayer
Description:
Spellcasters have -2 on focus rolls caused by your attacks and you have +2 on saves agains magic. 
Each time you select this talent, the penalties/bonuses are increased by 2.

Name: Energetic Movement
Description: You gain the ability to spend mana to perform additional actions on your turn. You can perform multiple of these actions on your turn.

Name: Saving Throw Mastery
Description: You gain +2 to a saving throw of your choice

Name: Terrain Bond
Description:
Select a terrain you are bonded to from the terrain types. You cant be surprised in the bonded terrain. You have a +5 to initiative, perception and tracking while in the bonded terrain. You have a +2 to AC when in the bonded terrain. 
Selecting this talent again allows you to select another bonded terrain

Name: Light Armor Master
Description: You can wear medium armor and use sheilds, and each time you select this talent, you level up your Light Armor Mastery

Name: Additional Spells
Description:
You gain additional Spells equal to your spellcasting modifier. You can learn spells that cost up to 4 mana more than the highest mana cost spell you know.
Ex: if you have a spell costing 5 mana, you can pick spells that cost 9 mana, maximum

Name: Smite
Description:
Each time you select this feature you learn 2 Smite Abilities.
When you hit an enemy with a melee weapon attack, you can spend mana to smite them with one of the selected smite abilities. 
More mana can be added to increase the damage. 2 extra mana increases the damage by 1 die

Name: Freedom of Movement
Description: You can use part (or all) of your movement as a Supporting Action. Your total movement speed during a round is not increased.

Name: Archmage
Description: You gain abilities that enhances your spellcasting power and flexibility. Each time you select this feature, you level up your Archmage talent.

Name: Spell Attack Mastery
Description: Gain bonuses to your spell attacks. Each time you select this talent, you level up your Spell Attack Mastery.

Name: Sworn Essence
Description:
You have studied a type of monster; their weaknesses, their behavior, the subtle trails their essence leaves behind. Select a monster type. You gain the abilities Know your enemy and Sense your enemy for this monster type.
Selecting this talent again allows you to select another monster type or increase the bonuses for an existing monster type.

Name: Spell Alteration
Description: Each time you select his feature, you learn 3 spell alteration abilities. When you cast a spell, you may spend mana to alter the spell.

Name: Heavy Armor Master
Description: You can wear heavy armor, and each time you select this talent, you level up your Heavy Armor Mastery

Name: Bloodrage
Description:
Each time you select this talent, you learn 2 of the Bloodrage Abilities.

When you or an ally is subject to harm (GMs discression), you may spend mana to go into a bloodrage as a Supporting Action or Reaction. You choose which types of bloodrage you enter, it could be a combination of multiple types. The mana cost is equal to the mana cost sum of the types you choose to enter.

While in a bloodrage, you cannot spend mana.
The bonuses from the ranges are passives, if not otherwise is explicitly stated.

At any time at the very start of your turn, if you have not taken from or dealt damage to another creature since the start of your last turn, you leave your bloodrage. At the start of your turn, you can voluntarily drop the bloodrage.

Name: Extra movement
Description: You gain +5ft to your movement speed

Name: Ability Score Improvement
Description: You gain +1 to an ability score of your choice

Name: Bloodmana
Description:
When you spend mana on a spell or ability, you may sacrifice HP to gain mana equal to half the HP sacrificed, rounded down, which can be used in the casting of the spell or the execution of the ability.
Any magical healing done as an effect of a spell or ability paid with blood mana is reduced by half.
You can not use this talent to forego the Mana Cost Ceiling.

Name: Spellcasting
Description:
You gain spellcasting in an ability and domain of your choice. Choose either Intelligence, Consciousness or Charisma for ability, and choose one domain from the list of domains. 
You gain an amount of spells equal to your modifier of the selected ability. You may select spells either having the same ability as you chose, or the selected domain, or both. You can select spells that cost a maximum of 5 mana.
You may select this talent only once.

Name: Medium Armor Master
Description: You can wear medium armor and use shields, and each time you select this talent, you level up your Medium Armor Mastery

Name: Additional Weapon Attack
Description: When you take the attack action with a melee or ranged weapon, you can make one additional weapon attack.

Name: Evasive Movements
Description: You gain the ability to perform evasive maneuvers as a reaction

Name: Battlecraft
Description: Each time you select this talent, you learn three abilities to use in combat to protect your allies or overpower your enemies.

Name: Ambush
Description:
Your daggers base damage die is increased to a d6.
You gain the ability to ambush an enemy dealing extra damage on weapon attacks. You ambush an enemy if either of the following are true:
• Enemy can’t see you and where you are attacking from
• Enemy is grappled by an ally
• You have advantage on your attack
• You have used the sprint action on your turn
The extra damage is equal to 1d6, and increases by 1d6 each time you select this talent.

Name: Channel of Conviction
Description:
When you select this talent, you learn 2 Channel of Conviction abilities based on your spellcasting Domain.
Channels of Conviction has a casting time of 1 round and requires an action to load, and an action to release. During the casting you cannot use Reactions or Supporting Actions. 
When you decide to cast a Channel of Conviction you load it as an action on your turn, and on your next turn, you use your action to release it.
Casting the Channel of Conviction breaks existing focus and requires focus to maintain the effect.

Name: Elemental Damage Mastery
Description: You master an element of your choice. Select a damage type of the elemental kind. Each time you select this talent, you level up your Elemental Damage Mastery for that damage type.

Name: Tough
Description: You gain +2 HP each level

Name: Savage Attacker
Description: Whenever you roll damage, you may reroll one die once

Name: Arcane Veins
Description:
You learn 2 spells of mana cost 2 or lower, and can cast it using an ability modifier of your choice. 
You gain +1 mana each level

Name: Darkvision
Description: You can see in the dark up to 120ft

Name: Thick Skin
Description: While you are wearing no armor, you can add your physicality modifier to your AC

Name: Second Chance
Description: Whenever you roll a save, you may reroll the save once

Name: Alert
Description: You gain +1 to initiative modifier per level

Name: Instinctive Combat Mastery
Description:
You can use your fists and any improvised weapons as melee weapons dealing bludgeoning damage. When you take the attack action on ypur turn with your fists or improvised weapons, you make two attacks. Improvised weapons can also be thrown with a range of 20ft. Base damage die for these attacks is 1d6.
Each time you select this feature, the base damage die is increased by one tier.

Name: Increased Resources
Description: Select Hit Points or Mana. The selected resource increases by an amount equal to a roll of the respective resource die.

Name: Extra spells
Description: You gain additional Spells equal to your spellcasting modifier. You can learn spells that has a mana cost up to the highest mana cost spell you know.

Name: Spell Save Mastery
Description: Gain bonuses to your spells that require saves. Each time you select this talent, you level up your Spell Save Mastery.

Name: Lurker
Description: While you are hidden, your ranged attacks that miss the target no longer reveals you

Name: Assassin
Description:
If you are Ambushing an enemy, your crit chance is increased by 1.
Ex: If you normally crit on a 20, you now crit on a 19 and a 20.

If the target is Surprised, the attack always crits.

Name: Monstrous Weapon Master
Description: You learn the ability to wield Monstrous Weapons

Name: Pushing attack / Trip Attack
Description: When you make a weapon attack against a creature, you may try to push it 10ft away from you, or knock them prone. On a hit the target must make a Phy save to avoid the effect. The DC of the save is 10 pluss the mana you spent.

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 3 - Thrown
Description: When you hit a creature with a thrown weapon, you can choose to push them 10ft away from you.

Name: Spell Save Mastery - Level 4
Description: The range of your spell save spells are increased by 5ft.

Name: Potent Power
Description: When rolling damage on a spell, you may spend mana to automatically roll max on a number of dice equal to half the mana spent rounded down.

Name: Growth Rage
Description: You increase in size by a magnitude of 1. Your AC is reduced by 2 and your damage die with Physicality based melee weapons is doubled.

Name: Spell Save Mastery - Level 3
Description: Your spell save spells crit if the target rolls a natural 1 on the save.

Name: Precision Attack
Description: When you make an attack roll, you have a +3 to the attack roll. This bonus increases by 1 for every 2 extra mana spent.

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 3 - Sword
Description: When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points with a sword weapon, you can immediately make another attack.

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 3 - Bow
Description: When using a bow weapon, you ignore half cover. Enemies within 5ft of you does not impose disadvantage on your ranged attacks.

Name: Medium Armor Mastery - Level 3
Description: You can add your AGI modifier to your AC, up to a maximum of +3

Name: Spell Save Mastery - Level 5
Description: The range of your spell save spells are increased by 5ft.

Name: Healing Spirit (Beauty/Nature)
Description:
You brand a point on the ground for 3 rounds. Any ally that are within 10ft of the mark during their round heals for 1d8 hp.
The radius is increased by 5ft for every 2 extra mana spent.
The healing is increased by 1d8 for every 4 extra mana spent.

Name: Lingering spell
Description: You may spend 2 mana to double the duration of a spell.

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 3 - Axe
Description: When you hit an enemy with an axe weapon, you can choose to grapple them. You can use your supporting action to try and move the enemy around you, or push them prone or 5ft away. While grappling them this way, you can not make an attack with that weapon.

Name: Regenerative Rage
Description: At the start of your turn, you heal 1 hit point die.

Name: Elemental Projectile
Description: You imbue a projectile with elemental energy of your choice. Choose one of the elemental damage types; Fire, Cold, Lightning, Poison, Acid. On a hit, the projectile deals an extra 1d6 damage of the chosen damage type.

Name: Holy Smite
Description: 1d8 radiant damage

Name: Menacing Rage
Description:
When you enter your bloodrage, you let out a Frightening Howl.
You let out a howl that sends chills down the spines of your enemies. Each creature within 15ft must make a Con save or be frightened of you. The DC is equal to 10 pluss the mana spent using this ability.

Name: Spell Attack Mastery - Level 2
Description: +1 to attack rolls with spells

Name: Rend
Description: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you deal an extra 1d6 damage, and they are Bleeding

Name: Frenzy Rage
Description: When you take the attack action with a weapon on your turn, you get an additional weapon attack.

Name: Fist of the Heavens
Description: 2d8 thunder damage

Name: Parry
Description: When an enemy attacks you with a weapon attack, you can use your reaction to attempt to parry the attack, giving you a +5 to AC until the end of their turn. You may spend extra mana to increase the AC bonus by 1 for every 2 extra mana spent.

Name: Heavy Armor Mastery - Level 1
Description: You can wear heavy armor and shields

Name: Heavy Armor Mastery - Level 3
Description: While you are wearing heavy armor, damage from physical attacks are reduced by 3.

Name: Spell Attack Mastery - Level 5
Description: If you miss with a spell attack, the spell still deals half damage.

Name: Elemental Mastery - Level 3
Description: Enemies that are immune to the selected damage type are only resistant to your attacks of this type, and enemies that are resistant take normal damage.

Name: Tactician
Description: You gain the ability to spend mana to add improve your skill rolls. Each mana spent gives you a +1 to your skill roll.

Name: Covering Attack
Description: When an enemy makes an attack of opportunity, you can use your reaction and spend 3 mana to make a single attack against that enemy. On a hit, you stop the opportunity attack, and the targets reaction is lost.

Name: Shield Bash
Description: You make an attack with your shield. On a hit you deal bludgeoning damage and the target must make a Phy save or be pushed 10ft away or be knocked prone, your choice. The DC of the save is 10 pluss the mana you spent.

Name: Archmage - Level 1
Description: You gain the ability to spend more mana to empower spells. You can spend a maximum extra mana equal to your level. Damage increases by one die for every 2 extra mana spent. For spells that do not deal damage, the amount of affected creatures affected are increased by one for each extra mana spent.

Name: Resistant Rage
Description: You are resistant to piercing, slashing and bludgeoning damage

Name: Mana Regeneration
Description: Gain the ability to regain mana on a short rest

Name: Sprint
Description: Your movement speed for this round increases by an amount equal to your movement speed.

Name: Cleave
Description: You swing your melee weapon in a 15ft arc in front of you, possibly hitting multiple enemies within range. Roll one attack roll against the individual AC of all creatures caught in the arc.

Name: Spell Attack Mastery - Level 1
Description: +2 to attack rolls with spells

Name: Altered spell
Description: You may spend 3 mana to change the spells damage type into any elemental damage type, or spend 6 mana to change the damage type into any damage type.

Name: Elemental Mastery - Level 2
Description: You have resistance to the selected damage type.

Name: Double Cast
Description:
You may spend additional mana equal to the mana cost of the spell to twin it, possibly targeting two creatures. 
This can only be done for spells that target a single creature.

Name: Frightening Howl
Description: You let out a howl that sends chills down the spines of your enemies. Each creature within 15ft must make a Con save or be frightened of you. The DC is equal to 10 pluss the mana spent using this ability.

Name: Additional Weapon Attack 1
Description: When you take the attack action with a melee or ranged weapon, you can make one additional weapon attack.

Name: Spell Save Mastery - Level 2
Description: +1 to spell save DC

Name: Piercing Projectile
Description: You channel your essence into a projectile, giving it piercing abilities, possibly hitting all targets on a straight line. Roll one attack roll against the individual AC of all creatures caught in the line.

Name: Archmage - Level 3
Description: You have a +4 to focus rolls to maintain focus on a spell

Name: Hide
Description: You attempt to hide in an area heavily obscured to your enemies. You gain +1 to your stealth roll per extra mana spent.

Name: Swift Cast
Description: You may spend 4 mana to cast a main action spell as a support action

Name: Know your enemy
Description:
You gain the following bonuses
• +2 to hit and 1d6 extra dmg to the selected monster type
• Advantage on tracking creatures of this monster type
Bonus to hit and damage increases by +2 and 1d6 respectively every time you select this talent for the same monster type.

Name: Additional Weapon Attack 2
Description: When you take the attack action with a melee or ranged weapon, you can make one additional weapon attack.

Name: Protective Pocket
Description: When casting a spell, you may spend mana to create protective pockets within the spells area, shielding creatures from the damage. The number of creatures you can protect is equal to half the mana spent rounded down.

Name: Sacred Ward (Order/Knowledge)
Description:
Create a 20 ft aura for 3 rounds. Allies inside gain +2 AC and +2 on saving rolls.
Spend more mana to increase aura by 10ft for every 3 extra mana spent

Name: Medium Armor Mastery - Level 1
Description: You can wear medium armor, and you can add your AGI modifier to your AC, up to a maximum of +2

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 3 - Mace
Description: Attack rolls you make with a mace weapon ignores armor bonuses

Name: Turn Undead (Light/Darkness)
Description:
You present a holy symbol. All undeads of Level 2 or lower within 30ft must make a Con save or be frightened of you for 1 minute.
All undead below Level 0.5 is destroyed on a failed save.
For every 3 extra mana spent, the Level of the affected undeads are increased by 1.

Name: Silent spell
Description: You may spend 3 mana to remove the verbal part of a spell you cast

Name: Brace
Description: Your movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks and you have +4 to AC +2 to saves against visible effects such as traps, breath attacks, or spells.

Name: Spell Attack Mastery - Level 3
Description: Your spell attacks ignore half cover.

Name: Evasion
Description: When you succeed in a Phy save or an Agi save, you can use your reaction to take no damage instead of half damage.

Name: Powerfull Rage
Description: You gain +2 to damage rolls you make with melee weapon attacks. Damage bonus is increased by 1 for each 2 extra mana spent.

Name: Ensnaring Projectile
Description: You imbue a projectile with magical ensnaring vines. On a hit, the projectile deals an extra 1d4 bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a Phy save with a DC equal to 10 pluss the mana spent on this ability or become rooted.

Name: Widened spell
Description: You may spend 3 mana to increase the area of effect of a spell. The area is increased based on the shape of the area; 5ft radius for circle, sphere, 10ft in each dimension for square, cube and cone, double the length for line.

Name: Archmage - Level 2
Description: You gain the ability to enhance allies spells with your own spells as a supporting action.

Name: Far Reach
Description:
You may spend 2 mana to double the range of your spell. If the spell has a range of 15 ft or lower, the range is now 30ft. 
Spells with ranges of touch or self is not affected.

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 3 - Heavy
Description: When you hit with an attack with a heavy weapon, roll damage dice twice and take the higher result.

Name: Pickpocket/Lockpick
Description: You attempt pickpocket someone or attempt to open a lock. +1 to the finesse roll per extra mana spent.

Name: Spell Save Mastery - Level 1
Description: +1 to spell save DC

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 3 - Spear
Description: When you hit a creature with a spear weapon, you can choose to push them 10ft away from you.

Name: Arcane Projectile
Description: When making a ranged weapon attack, you imbue the projectile with magical power, making it deal an extra 1d4 magic damage on a hit.

Name: Medium Armor Mastery - Level 2
Description: You no longer have Stealth disadvantage with medium armor.

Name: Elemental Fists
Description: You imbue your fists with elemental energy of your choice. Choose one of the elemental damage types; Fire, Cold, Lightning, Poison, Acid. On a hit, your unarmed attacks deal an extra 1d6 damage of the chosen damage type.

Name: Fast Reload
Description: You ignore reloading properties of weapons.

Name: Heavy Armor Mastery - Level 2
Description: You can wear heavy armor without any movement speed penalty

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 3 - Dagger
Description: Base damage die for your daggers are increased by one tier (1d4 → 1d6)

Name: Warm Hands
Description: You hands have a healing effect on creatures you touch. You can spend mana to channel your warmth over to the creature, healing it for two times the mana spent. This ability also removes any conditions that may be affecting the creature, like charm or fear.

Name: Radiant Burst (Light/Chaos)
Description:
Emit a flash of divine power. All enemies within 15 ft must make a AGI save or take 4d8 radiant damage, half damage on a save.
Spend more mana to increase damage by 1d10 for every 3 mana spent

Name: Polymorph (Nature/Knowledge)
Description:
You turn yourself into a beast Level 2 or lower that you have deep knowledge of (GM discression) for up to 1 hour. If you take damage causing you to reach or pass 0 hit points while in your beast form, you immediately revert to your normal form, and suffer any excess damage. While in the beast form, you may as an action revert back to your normal form.
The level of the beast you turn into increases by 1 for every 3 extra mana spent

Name: Charge
Description: If you run at least 10ft in a straight line up to an enemy, and hit them with a melee weapon attack, you gain a +5 to the damage roll. If the attack crits, the enemy is knocked prone, given that it is no larger than one  size larger than you.

Name: Dodge
Description: When you are hit by an attack that deals damage, you can use your reaction to halve the incomming damage.

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 3 - Reach
Description: Enemies entering your reach provoke attacks of opportunity

Name: Rallying Rage
Description: When you enter your bloodrage, you yell out a rallying cry. Each ally within 20ft can take an attack action as a reaction or cast a reaction spell. Radius is increased by 5ft per extra mana spent.

Name: Spell Attack Mastery - Level 4
Description: +1 to attack rolls with spells

Name: Sense your enemy
Description:
Can spend 2 mana to sense any creatures of the selected monster type within 300ft (+100ft per extra mana spent)
Mana cost for sense your enemy is reduced by 1 mana every time you select this talent for the same monster type.

Name: Steady Aim
Description: When you make a ranged weapon attack, you may steady your aim to double the range.

Name: Rally
Description: You rally your allies to fight. Each ally within 20ft gets temporary hit points equal to two times the mana spent using this ability.

Name: Deflect Missile
Description:
When your or an ally within 5ft of you is hit by a ranged weapon attack, you may as a reaction reduce the damage taken by 1d10 + 1d10 per 2 extra mana spent. 
If the damage is reduced to 0, you may spend an additional 2 mana to redirect the attack towards an enemy within range. Range for the attack is 20ft/60ft.

Name: Blessed Restoration (Beauty/Chaos)
Description:
Healing spews out from you. Roll 6d8 and divide the resulting sum equally into healing to your allies within 30ft.
Healing is increased by 1d8 for every 2 extra mana spent.

Name: Riposte
Description: When an enemy attacks you with a melee weapon attack, you can use your reaction to make one melee weapon attack against your attacker. On a hit, you stop their attack from landing

Name: Evasive Footwork
Description: You tactically position yourself in an advantageous position, giving you a +2 to AC. The bonus to AC increases by 1 for every 2 mana you spend.

Name: Burning Smite
Description: 1d10 fire damage

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 3 - Crossbow
Description: When using a crossbow weapon, you ignore half cover. Enemies within 5ft of you does not impose disadvantage on your ranged attacks.

Name: Elemental Mastery - Level 1
Description: When you roll damage for the selected damage type, you can reroll any 1s.

Name: Taunt
Description:
You yell out a taunting challenge. Each enemy within 20ft must make a Con save or be taunted by you. The DC is equal to 10 pluss the mana spent using this ability.
Taunted creatures cannot use their attack action to attack someone else than you, unless you are out of range of their attacks.

Name: Winter Smite
Description: 1d6 cold damage

Name: Shadow Smite
Description: 1d8 necrotic damage, Phy save or Phy reduced by 1d4

Name: Fearsome Smite
Description: 1d8 necrotic damage, Cha save or be frightened of you

Name: Booming Smite
Description: 1d6 bludgeoning damage, Phy save or knocked 10ft away and prone

Name: Skill Mastery
Description: You gain +3 to any two skills of your choice. The bonus from this talent to a single talent is capped at +9.

Name: Sentinel
Description:
When you make an attack of opportunity, you may spend 2 mana to regain your reaction on a hit. You spend this mana before you make the attack. 
Once you spend mana like this, you can only use your reaction for opportunity attacks until the start of the next round.

Name: Momentus Rage
Description:
You gain +2 to attack rolls with melee weapons. At the start of each of your turns, if you are still in a blood rage, this bonus is increased by 1.
You may increase the initial bonus by 1 for each 2 extra mana spent.

Name: Twinned Projectile
Description: When you make a ranged weapon attack, you may double the projectiles, possibly hitting two enemies, or hitting one enemy with two projectiles. Roll separately for the projectiles.

Name: Life Chain (Darkness/Order)
Description: You link your essence to another creature of your choice within 60ft for 1 minute. Each time the creature takes damage, the damage is halved, and you take the halved damage. You are resistant to this damage.

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 7 - Heavy
Description: When using a heavy weapon, you crit on a 19 or 20.

Name: Spell Save Mastery - Level 7
Description: +1 to spell save DC

Name: Medium Armor Mastery - Level 5
Description: While wearing medium armor, you have a +1 to AC.

Name: Heavy Armor Mastery - Level 4
Description: You can use a Tower Shield without any penalties

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 7 - Spear
Description: Attacks you make with spear weapons deal extra damage based on the distance traveled right before the attack hits. Extra damage is equal to 3 damage per 10ft traveled.

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 7 - Dagger
Description: When using a dagger weapon, you crit on a 19 or 20.

Name: Heavy Armor Mastery - Level 5
Description: While wearing heavy armor, you have +1 to AC

Name: Light Armor Mastery - Level 2
Description: Your buckler is effective against ranged attacks

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 7 - Mace
Description: Physicality bonus to damage rolls with mace weapons are doubled

Name: Spell Save Mastery - Level 6
Description: The range of your spell save spells are increased by 5ft.

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 7 - Sword
Description: You can add both Physicality and Agility modifiers to damage rolls with sword weapons

Name: Light Armor Mastery - Level 4
Description: While wearing light armor, you have a +1 to Agi saves

Name: Light Armor Mastery - Level 3
Description: While wearing light armor, you can add your Agi modifier to your AC, no limit.

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 7 - Axe
Description: Physicality bonus to damage rolls with axe weapons are doubled

Name: Medium Armor Mastery - Level 4
Description: While wearing medium armor, you have a +1 to Phy saves

Name: Spell Attack Mastery - Level 7
Description: Your spell attacks crit on a 19 or 20.

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 7 - Bow
Description: When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points with a bow weapon, you can immediately make another attack

Name: Weapon Mastery - level 7 - Crossbow
Description: When using a crossbow weapon, you crit on a 19 or 20.

Name: Spell Attack Mastery - Level 6
Description: +1 to attack rolls with spells

Name: Light Armor Mastery - Level 5
Description: While wearing light armor, you have a +1 to AC.

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 7 - Thrown
Description: You can add both your physicality and your agility modifier to the damage rolls made with thrown weapons.

Name: Light Armor Mastery - Level 1
Description: You can can use a buckler and wear light armor. While wearing light armor, you can add your Agi modifier to your AC, up to a maximum of +4.

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 7 - Reach
Description: Hitting an enemy with an opportunity attack reduces their movement to 0 until the start of your next turn.

Name: Weapon Mastery - Mace
Description: Gain bonuses to attacks with Mace weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 1 - Thrown
Description: +2 to attack rolls with Thrown weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 5 - Crossbow
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Crossbow weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 4 - Reach
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Reach weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 1 - Crossbow
Description: +2 to attack rolls with Crossbow weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 4 - Sword
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Sword weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Spear
Description: Gain bonuses to attacks with Spear weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Crossbow
Description: Gain bonuses to attacks with Crossbow weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 2 - Axe
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Axe weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 6 - Reach
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Reach weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 1 - Heavy
Description: +2 to attack rolls with Heavy weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 6 - Sword
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Sword weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 6 - Mace
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Mace weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 2 - Reach
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Reach weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 6 - Axe
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Axe weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 4 - Axe
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Axe weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 1 - Spear
Description: +2 to attack rolls with Spear weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 2 - Crossbow
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Crossbow weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 6 - Bow
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Bow weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 5 - Spear
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Spear weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 1 - Axe
Description: +2 to attack rolls with Axe weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 6 - Crossbow
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Crossbow weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 1 - Mace
Description: +2 to attack rolls with Mace weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 5 - Dagger
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Dagger weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Axe
Description: Gain bonuses to attacks with Axe weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Thrown
Description: Gain bonuses to attacks with Thrown weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 5 - Axe
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Axe weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Dagger
Description: Gain bonuses to attacks with Dagger weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Heavy
Description: Gain bonuses to attacks with Heavy weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 6 - Dagger
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Dagger weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 6 - Heavy
Description: +1 to attack rolls with Heavy weapon type

Name: Weapon Mastery - Level 2 - Mace
